titles: A letter from the Earl of Essex to His Highnesse Prince Rupert concerning the putting to death of souldiers come out of Ireland taken prisoners : with His Highnesse answer thereunto.
author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.
publisher: Printed by Robert Barker and John Bill,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
